name: Holiday Beach:Driving Car Pro
description:
Holiday Beach:Driving Car Pro is a new driving simulator game that takes you to sea & beaches. Take your seat and drive your car through different exotic beaches where you will explore parking lots. Be careful, beach parking zone are full of hurdles and blocks, you will need to avoid colliding and not to fail any level of this beach parking game. Finish all the levels and shows that you are the best bus driver.
Features:
- Many challenging Car parking missions
- Smooth and easy driving controls
- Detailed 3d beach environment
- Realistic sound effects
- Stunning HD graphics
- Smooth gameplay
